QuestData.Title: Break On Through
QuestData.Description:
Cannon's ready, boss.
Care to do the honors?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Ramparts Cannon to break the barrier at the gate to Upper Corlain.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ballaster's plan worked! He is certainly a resourceful blacksmith.
Come, Inquisitor. Waycrest Manor is just ahead!
